title: Unusual Spike in Respiratory Cases Reported in South Jakarta
summary: Local clinics report a 20% increase in patient volume with severe flu-like symptoms. Ministry of Health investigating.

title: Hospitals on Alert as Unknown Viral Strain Spreads
summary: Bed occupancy rates rise as severe pneumonia cases surge. Initial tests negative for COVID-19 and known Flu A strains.

title: WHO Monitor: Monitoring Cluster of Respiratory Illness in Indonesia
summary: The World Health Organization has been notified of a cluster of respiratory illnesses. Genomic sequencing is underway.
